edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.requirement

Class Requirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.requirement.Requirement

  • public class Requirement
extends java.lang.Object
    Requirement class which is a context class of the state design pattern for the tracked requirement FSM. It represents a requirement tracked by ReqKeeper system.
    Author:
    Prem Subedi
